title: Do Not Associate with Pagan Nations
summary: Deuteronomy 7 commands Israel to destroy the nations in Canaan and not to intermarry or adopt their practices. God promises blessing and protection if Israel remains faithful to Him.

faq.question: Why were the Canaanite nations to be destroyed?
faq.answer: To prevent Israel from turning to idols and being led into sin.

faq.question: What blessings did God promise for obedience?
faq.answer: Fruitful families, abundant crops, health, and victory over enemies.
